title: Remove all 'Liquidity Locked' references site-wide

requirements.text: Audit all frontend components (TokenomicsSection, TickerBanner, HeroSection, AboutSection, HowToBuySection, Navigation, CommunitySection, Footer, and any other files) and remove every visible instance of 'Liquidity Locked', 'liquidity locked', 'liq locked', or any equivalent phrasing referencing a liquidity lock. This includes card labels, badge text, ticker phrases, tooltips, and body copy. Do not replace removed text with alternative copy â€” simply omit it entirely. The remaining layout should reflow cleanly without the removed elements.

quotes: remove any where it says liquidity locked on the site

acceptanceCriteria: No instance of 'Liquidity Locked', 'liquidity locked', or equivalent phrasing appears anywhere on the rendered site
TokenomicsSection contains no liquidity locked card, badge, or text
TickerBanner contains no liquidity locked phrase
All other components (HeroSection, AboutSection, HowToBuySection, Navigation, CommunitySection, Footer) contain no liquidity locked text
The layout of any section that previously contained a liquidity locked element reflows cleanly without visual gaps or broken grids

constraints: Do not replace removed 'Liquidity Locked' text with any alternative copy
Do not modify files listed in frontend.immutablePaths
nonGoals: Adding new tokenomics content or cards
Changing any other tokenomics values or copy
